product_name: The North Face Zipline Rain Jacket - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Waterproof yet breathable, The North Face Zipline jacket for girls lets young adventurers play outside even when rain clouds roll in. HyVent(R) 2-layer construction offers waterproof, breathable, seam-sealed protection; polyester mesh lining wicks moisture from body to keep skin cool and comfortable. Full-length front zipper features a stormflap to keep the wind out; hood completes coverage. The North Face Zipline jacket features elastic cuffs and zippered handwarmer pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Waterproof yet breathable, The North Face Zipline jacket for girls lets young adventurers play outside even when rain clouds roll in.
